ygData.subject: Re: A good place
ygData.msgSnippet: No you can attack these Aviak s they have no faction standings at all.  They will not attack you on sight, only attack when attacked, but they will also attack
ygData.messageBody:
No you can attack these Aviak's they have no faction standings at all. They
will not attack you on sight, only attack when attacked, but they will also
attack if they see you attacking another one. If you're in a group you
should do fine, in South Karana I can kill the lowest Aviak eget or
something like that by myself. Egets con blue to me but I just root his
butt and blast away at him and then go in for the kill.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
**************************


> From: "Cimorene" <1Cimorene1@...>
>
> Hiyas :) I have seen the aviak's by Lake Rathe, my question is are they
good
> or evil? I hunt with a ranger who will also let me die if i kill most
> animals (the ranger is question is my husband) The aviaks look to me
dubious
> or indiff so i am unsure. Does anyone know? thx:)
